tool_description: Api showing all latest Video Games news and all this nerd stuff :)
name: Games News API
title: Games News API

api_list.name: Get a Specific News
api_list.description: Entering the name of the video game, the relative news will return
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/call of duty"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{gamename}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a News From a specific Website
api_list.description:
This Endpoint will return all latest news about gaming from your specific website
Available Websites:

- wired
- gamerant
- gamespot
- everyeye
- nbcnews
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/from/gamerant"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "games-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
